TableField.name: WorkOrderID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|Numerical ID to identify and track work orders

TableField.name: RelatedModuleID
TableField.phrase: Related Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the work order

ForeignField.name: RelatedModule
ForeignField.phrase: Related Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the work order

TableField.name: RelatedRecordID
TableField.phrase: Related Record ID|The unique ID of the related record within the related module

DynamicForeignField.name: RelatedRecordDescription
DynamicForeignField.phrase: Record Description|A description of the related record based on a combination of field values assigned from within the related module
DynamicForeignField.sample: Maintenance Shop - Paint Area Review, 2-27-2004, Mattias Thorslund

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for tracking and managing this work order

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for tracking and managing this work order

TableField.name: WorkOrderNo
TableField.phrase: Work Order Number|A unique number assigned to the work order. This number is usually assigned by a maintenance and engineering department and is pre-printed on work order forms

TableField.name: WorkOrderTypeID
TableField.phrase: Work Order Type|A general category used to group work orders of similar types

CodeField.name: WorkOrderType
CodeField.phrase: Work Order Type|A general category used to group work orders of similar types

RemoteField.name: IssuedDate
RemoteField.phrase: Issued Date|Date the work order was issued

RemoteField.name: AssignedDate
RemoteField.phrase: Assigned Date|Date the work order was generated

CalculatedField.name: AssignmentDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Assignment Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the issued date and the final assignment date

RemoteField.name: PersonAssignedID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Assigned|The individual assigned responsibility for performing the work requested

ForeignField.name: PersonAssigned
ForeignField.phrase: Person Assigned|The individual assigned responsibility for performing the work requested

RemoteField.name: AssignedDueDate
RemoteField.phrase: Assigned Due Date|Date the work order should be completed by

RemoteField.name: CompletionDate
RemoteField.phrase: Completion Date|Date the work order was completed

CalculatedField.name: CompletionDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Completion Delay|A calculated field based on the number of days between the issued date and the completion date

TableField.name: WorkOrderTitle
TableField.phrase: Work Order Title|A short and descriptive title used to describe the work order

TableField.name: WorkOrderDesc
TableField.phrase: Work Order Description|A detailed description of the work being requested
TableField.sample: Modify the tape cutter on packaging line number one. Install a blade guard similar to the ones in place on lines 3 through 7

TableField.name: PriorityID
TableField.phrase: Priority|The level of priority associated with this work order

CodeField.name: Priority
CodeField.phrase: Priority|The level of priority associated with this work order

TableField.name: WorkOrderStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|The present status of the work order

CodeField.name: WorkOrderStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|The present status of the work order

SummaryField.name: BusinessConsequences
SummaryField.phrase: Business Consequences|A list of associated business consequences

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: AssignmentDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: Assignment Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the issued date and the final assignment date

CombinedField.name: CompletionDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: Completion Delay|A calculated field based on the number of days between the issued date and the completion date

CombinedField.name: SystemWorkOrderNumber
CombinedField.phrase: System Work Order Number|A combined field used to describe assign a work order number from the system automatically

LinkField.name: RelatedRecordLink
LinkField.phrase: Related Record Link|An internal link to the related record.

CombinedField.name: RelatedModuleRecord
CombinedField.phrase: Related Record|A combined field used to display the related module name and record ID

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: WorkOrder
CombinedField.phrase: Work Order|A combined field used to describe this work order when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: 3413 | Repair diamond plate walkway on scanner | 02/02/2006

CodeCheckSearchField.name: BusinessConsequences
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Business Consequences|Filter search results by one or more related business consequences

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperatives
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about a work order associated with a related record

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a work order associated with a related record

EditScreen.name: BusinessConsequences
EditScreen.phrase: Consequences|Associate business consequences with a work order

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for a work order

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with a work order

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate physical files with a work order

EditScreen.name: Imperatives
EditScreen.phrase: Imperatives|Associate risk imperatives with a work order

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with a work order

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here.
